description: Raiden Shogun and Kujou Sara Banner was here !
Engulfing Lightning Weapon Banner has been added
Now you can wishing on previous banner by clicking (x) button on the top right of the page
Now you can create screenshot and link to share when wishing
Sagonomia Kokomi is ready to pull !
Everlasting Moonglow Weapon Banner has been added

Add more previous banner, Eula, Zhongli, Tartaglia/Childe, Albedo, Ganyu, Xiao, Hu Tao, Venti is ready to pull !
Click (x) button on the top right of the page to change the banner
Tartaglia is ready to pull !
Polar Star Weapon Banner has been added
Hu Tao Character Banner has been added !
Thoma is ready to pull !
Staff of Homma & Elegy for The End Weapon Banner has been added
Albedo Banner was here !
Eula Banner also here !
Freedom Sworn & Song of Broken Pines Weapon Banner has been added
Fixing Bugs of History.

if you find any error, follow this steps to reset browser cache specialy only for WIsh Simulator Site . Open Inpect ELement ( CTRL + Shift i ) -> Application -> Storage -> Click on "Clear Site Data" Button
Ignore the steps above if this is the first time you visit this site or if you already do reset
Arrataki Itto character Banner is ready to pull
Redhorn Stonethresher Weapon Banner has been added !
Implement Epitomized Path System to Weapon Banner for patch 2.0 and above
Now you can pull Shenhe and Yunjin the Best Waifu!
Calamity Queller Weapon Banner was added
Gong Xi Fa Cai. Wish you luck on Lantern Rite event
Zhongli and Ganyu Rerun Banner Already out here !
Vortex and Amos Weapon Rerun Banner is ready to pull too !
Now you can pull without worry about running out of fate, just activate the Unlimited Fates Option in Menu by clicking the (?) button on top of the page
Event Banner Updated, Now you can pull Yae Miko here !
Yae Miko signature Weapon, Kagura's Verity is ready to pull too !
Inventory Updated, Now You can show all Characters and Weapons both you already got or not
Raiden Shogun Rerun Banner was here !
Sagonomia Kokomi is ready to pull too!
Weapon Banner Updated, Engulfing Lightning and Everlasting Moonglow already added

Due to high number of visitors, Our monthly bandwidth also increased. We need to upgrade the hosting plan to keep this app alive. So We'll show some ad on this app.
We're sorry to you, actually we don't want to ruin your wishing experience. If you feel annoyed with ad, feel free to use Ad blocker, we will not forbit you
We Have plan to release the android version of this simulator, but We see there are many apps similar to this, so We will reconsider this
Kamisato Ayato Banner was here !
Venti is ready to pull too!
Weapon Banner Updated, Haran Geppaku Futsu and Elegy for the End already added
